data.text: @LivnUndaATyrant @nzherald Hard to believe the condition was "unrelated". The deaths were almost certainly a COMBINATION of Covid WITH other conditions.
@nzherald Unfortunately the numbers for hospitalisation and deaths are meaningless as there is little distinction made between ‘with’ and ‘from’ covid 19.
@TheCoderReturns @nzherald You don’t understand fundamental of pandemic

@TheCoderReturns @nzherald It doesn’t matter with or from. Even it doesn’t matter whether caused by COVID or flu. Our health system will be overwhelmed. More people will die because they won’t get good care as usual.
@TheCoderReturns @nzherald Except they weren't. It was a COMBINATION of Covid and other causes. Are people too dumb to realise this?
@nzherald Hype more. Because this is disingenuous https://t.co/7Gozb6jBNG
@TockTick1776 @wh0_inthe_w0rld @nzherald Were these all covid deaths? https://t.co/6NLsm2lSzA
@nzherald A MUST READ - COVID Deaths Have Been Vastly Overcounted https://t.co/14DfsRYkJz
